tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    age_range VARCHAR(20),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    purchase_history JSON
);

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    segment_name TEXT,
    segment_type TEXT,
    target_group_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Customer (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    group_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (group_id) REFERENCES TargetedAudienceGroup(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingStrategy (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    target_group_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (target_group_id) REFERENCES TargetedAudienceGroup(id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_segment_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES segments(segment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_segments_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    segment_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES marketing_strategies(strategy_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (segment_id) REFERENCES segments(segment_id)
);
